root.name: Spy Fox: Operation Ozone
root.description: OverviewSpy Fox: Operation Ozone is an adventure game developed and published by Humongous Entertainment for the PC and Mac platforms.Spy Fox: Operation Ozone is the third game in the popular point-and-click Spy Fox series. Players can join Spy Fox as he travels along the world looking for the ingredients to a Congeal Pill, which will stop Poodles Galore. Poodles' plan is to use a giant aerosol can to break down the ozone and make the world too hot for people, forcing them to buy her sunblock.
